name: Rocket's little Adventure
description:
STORY
In this Game you play as the little paramedic robot ''Rocket''.
You definitely don't play as a killer machine, but rather as a savior of the residents. The villages are far from the hospitals. You can't get there with an ambulance. Rocket's goal is to get to the villages to take care of his patients. This is how Rocket's little Adventure starts!

SPECIAL THANKS TO MY LOVELY COOKIES:
